catalog_script_client.name: Populate PIA Guide

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_3c1bb9f997f3b150c617b8e6f053af8c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Privacy Impact Assessment Intake Form">32fc1cc597632110c617b8e6f053af10</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate PIA Guide</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var recProd = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
	recProd.addQuery('sys_id', '32fc1cc597632110c617b8e6f053af10');
	recProd.query();
		if(recProd.next()){
			var gr = new GlideRecord('x_935283_pia_questionnaire');
			gr.addQuery('pia_type', 'PIA');
			gr.query();

			if (gr.next()) {
				recProd.description=gr.questionnaire;
				recProd.update();
			}
		}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>blopez</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-18 13:41:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3c1bb9f997f3b150c617b8e6f053af8c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate PIA Guide</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Privacy Impact Assessment" source="x_935283_pia">d611bca697302110c617b8e6f053af80</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Privacy Impact Assessment">d611bca697302110c617b8e6f053af80</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3c1bb9f997f3b150c617b8e6f053af8c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>blopez</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-18 14:59:28</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
